function.name: cursor-create_cursor
function.description: Creates a named streaming cursor that reads the document in portions. This cursor behaves like IEnumerable.Where over a stream: the filter must be stateless and evaluable on a single portion. The cursor does NOT keep counters and cannot perform global queries like 3rd occurrence.

name.description: Unique cursor name. If the name already exists, the call fails.

filterDescription.description: Stateless per-element filter description (like IEnumerable.Where). Must NOT depend on previous portions (no counters, no nth occurrence).

maxElements.description: Optional override for max elements per portion. Clamped to server limits.

maxBytes.description: Optional override for max bytes per portion. Clamped to server limits.
